projects.title: Factory Predictive Maintenance Rollout
projects.body:
# Executive Summary
Deploy sensor-driven predictive maintenance across two flagship assembly plants to cut unplanned downtime and improve throughput reliability.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Install sensor kits on critical presses and paint lines
- [ ] Build fault-risk dashboard for plant supervisors
- [ ] Train maintenance teams on predictive workflows

projects.title: Battery Supply Risk Hedging Program
projects.body:
# Executive Summary
Diversify battery cell sourcing and add contractual risk controls to protect EV launch timelines from commodity and geopolitical volatility.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Finalize dual-source supplier framework
- [ ] Establish monthly risk heatmap with scenario triggers
- [ ] Negotiate indexed pricing guardrails

projects.title: Dealer Portal UX Refresh
projects.body:
# Executive Summary
Modernize dealer workflows for inventory lookup and incentive visibility with minimal architectural changes.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Consolidate key workflows into a single dashboard
- [ ] Reduce lead capture steps from five to three
- [ ] Add context-aware help prompts

projects.title: Legacy Warranty Mainframe Rewrite
projects.body:
# Executive Summary
Replace the legacy warranty claims mainframe with a service-oriented platform to reduce long-term technical debt and support future automation.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Define target-state domain model and APIs
- [ ] Migrate historical claims data in staged waves
- [ ] Parallel-run old and new platforms for one quarter

updates.author: Program Management Office
updates.body:
# Weekly Rollup

Key achievements this week include progress on the Factory Predictive Maintenance rollout and alignment on the Dealer Portal UX refresh scope.

## Highlights

- **PRJ-001**: Sensor installation 40% complete at Plant A; dashboard prototype reviewed.
- **PRJ-003**: Consolidated workflow designs approved by Sales leadership.

## Next Week

- Begin pilot for predictive fault alerts.
- Dealer Portal: start development sprint one.

updates.author: Program Management Office
updates.body:
# Weekly Rollup

Battery supply hedging negotiations advanced; predictive maintenance pilot kicked off.

## Highlights

- **PRJ-002**: Dual-source framework draft shared with legal.
- **PRJ-001**: First sensor batch installed; baseline data collection started.
